mapper.insert: insert into user_detail(id, student_number, student_card, identified, role, avatar, phone_number, email, alias, description, create_time, update_time) values (#{id},#{studentNumber}, #{studentCard}, #{identified},#{role}, #{avatar}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{alias}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select id, student_number, student_card, identified, role, avatar, phone_number, email, alias, description, create_time, update_time from user_detail where id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_detail SET student_number = #{studentNumber}, student_card = #{studentCard}, identified = #{identified}, role = #{role}, avatar = #{avatar}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email}, alias = #{alias}, description = #{description}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE user_detail SET avatar = #{avatar}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
